args.natural_language_statement: Let Γ be a topological group acting continuously on a topological space X. If the quotient space X/Γ is compact, then (1) for every x : X there exists y in the orbit Γ • x whose stabilizer {g : Γ | g • y = y} is compact in Γ, and (2) there exists a compact subset K ⊆ X that intersects every Γ-orbit (i.e. ∀x, ∃g, g • x ∈ K). Translate this statement into Lean4 syntax (no proof), ending the theorem statements with := by sorry.

retrieved_examples.nl: If a topological group G acts continuously on a topological space X and the quotient X/G is compact then there exists a compact set K ⊆ X meeting every orbit.
retrieved_examples.lean:
import Mathlib

variable {G : Type*} [Group G] [TopologicalSpace G] [TopologicalGroup G]
variable {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X]
variable [MulAction G X] [ContinuousMulAction G X]

theorem exists_compact_cross_section_of_compact_quotient (h : Compact (Quotient.{0} (orbit_rel : X → X → Prop)
) := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

variable (G : Type*) [Group G] [TopologicalSpace G] [TopologicalGroup G]
variable (X : Type*) [TopologicalSpace X] [MulAction G X] [ContinuousSMul G X]

open MulAction Set

/-- The stabilizer of a point x : X as a subset of G. -/
def stabilizer (x : X) : Set G := { g : G | g • x = x }

/-- If Γ acts continuously on X and the quotient X/Γ is compact, then
1) every orbit contains a point with compact stabilizer, and
2) there is a compact subset of X meeting every orbit. -/
theorem exists_compact_stabilizer_and_cross_section
  (h : CompactSpace (Quotient (MulAction.orbitRel G X))) :
  (∀ x : X, ∃ y : X, y ∈ orbit G x ∧ IsCompact (stabilizer G y)) ∧
  ∃ K : Set X, IsCompact K ∧ ∀ x : X, ∃ g : G, g • x ∈ K := by sorry

result: Wrote file: benmckay_top_covering-spaces_221.lean

import Mathlib

variable {G : Type*} [Group G] [TopologicalSpace G] [IsTopologicalGroup G]
variable {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] [MulAction G X] [ContinuousSMul G X]

open MulAction Set

/-- The stabilizer of a point x : X as a subset of G. -/
def stabilizer (x : X) : Set G := { g : G | g • x = x }

/-- If Γ acts continuously on X and the quotient X/Γ is compact, then
1) every orbit contains a point with compact stabilizer, and
2) there is a compact subset of X meeting every orbit. -/
theorem exists_compact_stabilizer_and_cross_section
  (h : CompactSpace (Quotient (MulAction.orbitRel G X))) :
  (∀ x : X, ∃ y : X, y ∈ orbit G x ∧ IsCompact (stabilizer y)) ∧
  ∃ K : Set X, IsCompact K ∧ ∀ x : X, ∃ g : G, g • x ∈ K := by sorry

import Mathlib

variable {G : Type*} [Monoid G] [Group G] [TopologicalSpace G] [IsTopologicalGroup G]
variable {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] [MulAction G X] [ContinuousSMul G X]

open MulAction Set

/-- The stabilizer of a point x : X as a subset of G. -/
def stabilizer (x : X) : Set G := { g : G | g • x = x }

/-- If Γ acts continuously on X and the quotient X/Γ is compact, then
1) every orbit contains a point with compact stabilizer, and
2) there is a compact subset of X meeting every orbit. -/
theorem exists_compact_stabilizer_and_cross_section
  (h : CompactSpace (Quotient (MulAction.orbitRel G X))) :
  (∀ x : X, ∃ y : X, y ∈ orbit G x ∧ IsCompact (stabilizer y)) ∧
  ∃ K : Set X, IsCompact K ∧ ∀ x : X, ∃ g : G, g • x ∈ K := by sorry

1) every orbit contains a point with compact stabilizer, and
2) there is a compact subset of X meeting every orbit. -/

args.content:
import Mathlib

variable {G : Type*} [Group G] [TopologicalSpace G] [IsTopologicalGroup G]
variable {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] [MulAction G X] [ContinuousSMul G X]
variable [TopologicalSpace (Quotient (MulAction.orbitRel G X))]

open MulAction Set

/-- The stabilizer of a point x : X as a subset of G. -/
def stabilizer (x : X) : Set G := { g : G | g • x = x }

/-- If Γ acts continuously on X and the quotient X/Γ is compact, then
1) every orbit contains a point with compact stabilizer, and
2) there is a compact subset of X meeting every orbit. -/
theorem exists_compact_stabilizer_and_cross_section
  (h : CompactSpace (Quotient (MulAction.orbitRel G X))) :
  (∀ x : X, ∃ y : X, y ∈ orbit G x ∧ IsCompact (stabilizer y)) ∧
  ∃ K : Set X, IsCompact K ∧ ∀ x : X, ∃ g : G, g • x ∈ K := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

variable {u v : Level}
variable {G : Type u} [Monoid G] [Group G] [TopologicalSpace G] [IsTopologicalGroup G]
variable {X : Type v} [TopologicalSpace X] [SMul G X] [MulAction G X] [ContinuousSMul G X]

open MulAction Set

/-- The stabilizer of a point x : X as a subset of G. -/
def stabilizer (x : X) : Set G := { g : G | g • x = x }

/-- If Γ acts continuously on X and the quotient X/Γ is compact, then
1) every orbit contains a point with compact stabilizer, and
2) there is a compact subset of X meeting every orbit. -/
theorem exists_compact_stabilizer_and_cross_section
  (h : CompactSpace (Quotient (MulAction.orbitRel G X))) :
  (∀ x : X, ∃ y : X, y ∈ MulAction.orbit G x ∧ IsCompact ((stabilizer : X → Set G) y)) ∧
  ∃ K : Set X, IsCompact K ∧ ∀ x : X, ∃ g : G, g • x ∈ K := by sorry

result: Wrote file: benmckay_top_covering-spaces_221.lean
